Reviews.Title: HP Envy 17.3" Laptop
Reviews.Author: MOHAN
Reviews.Content: Excellent product of HP.  Very easy to operate in Windows 8 and very fast too.  The silver color is very good.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice Laptop
Reviews.Author: Ormondude
Reviews.Content: Its a very Nice Laptop I am only giving 4 stars for two reasons I hoped the keyboard was back lit and windows 8 is so annoying why there is no start button and you boot into a bunch of Microsoft add ons is beyond my consideration of desirable anyway once I learned that the desktop is not the boot page I then pulled things like control panel and computer to the desktop to make it less annoying but wow what were they thinking. OK So I was messing around with a computer game and hit F5  The Keys Lit UP So I changed my Review from 4stars to 5STARS  I am so happy

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Refugio Silva
Reviews.Content: Replacement for my old HP that finally stopped working; couldn't be more pleased! I've recommended this to my associates as they are looking for a replacement as well.

Reviews.Title: Great Laptop
Reviews.Author: kathy
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with the HP ENVY 17.3 Touch Laptop. I'm upgrading from windows XP and enjoying learning Windows 8 with "Teach Yourself Visually Windows". If you need to do something quickly you can toggle back to desktop view. It has everything I was looking for: a touch screen with great resolution, 2.4GHz ,8GB RAM, 1TB Hard Drive, DVD burner, Multimedia Card Slot, 4 USB 3.0 ports and a Webcam. The vendor also was great to work with. The first laptop I received had a problem with the touch screen and they shipped a replacement the next day. I would definitely recommend this laptop.

Reviews.Title: Slower than I thought it should be
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I expected lightening fast start up and response with an intel i7 processor, but I can't tell any difference from the i5 that I had earlier.  I am disappointed since this computer cost twice as much as the i5. Maybe all that preloaded software slows things down.  If so, HP and Microsoft and Intel should stop preloading stuff we don't need.

Reviews.Title: Powerful machine
Reviews.Author: Sinan
Reviews.Content: Everything is great about it except for the touch function. I could do without it.One or two keyboard keys get stuck from time to time.

ProductInfo.Features:
17.3-inch diagonal HD+ BrightView LED-backlit touchscreen display
4th generation Intel Core i7-4700MQ Processor
8GB DDR3 SDRAM (2 DIMM)
1TB 5400RPM hard drive with HP ProtectSmart Hard Drive Protection
Intel HD graphics 4600 with up to 1792MB total graphics memory
ProductInfo.Name: HP ENVY 17-J037CL 17.3" Touch Laptop Intel Core i7-4700MQ, 8GB Memory 1TB HDrive
